avr-g++   -mmcu=at90can128 -DF_CPU=16000000UL -std=c++11 -Os -Wall -pedantic -pedantic-errors -funsigned-char -funsigned-bitfields -fshort-enums -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fno-exceptions  -mmcu=at90can128 CMakeFiles/driver-serial-uart1-at90can128.dir/driver-serial-uart1-at90can128.cpp.o  -o driver-serial-uart1-at90can128  -L/usr/local/lib -Wl,--relax,--gc-sections -lspectre-at90can128 -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
